content: metroid/komayto finished measurements may vary with gauge 6 x3 5 x3 5 15 cm x 9 cm x 9 cm depending on teeth position materials ~ green white and red worsted weight yarn ~ polyfill ~ scissors ~ tapestry needle ~ us size f hook 3 75 mm for the metroid i used red heart super saver cherry red glow worm and white for a komayto i used red heart light blue for the body turqua for the teeth /tentacles abbreviations used chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet * = repeat decrease = invisible decrease slip_stitch = slip_stitch increase = increase st = stitch note do not join unless specified in the pattern also use regular color changes for this pattern teeth/ tentacle small make two chain 13 in white and join the row 1-3 single_crochet* 13 4 single_crochet in the next 7st decrease 3 times 10 5 single_crochet in the next 6 st decrease 2 times 8 6 single_crochet in the next 6 st decrease once 7 slip_stitch once cut the yarn tail and pull it through the final loop sew the stitches at the end of the teeth together teeth/tentacle large make two chain 12 in white and join the row 1-7 single_crochet* 12 8 single_crochet in the next 6 st decrease 3 times 9 9 single_crochet in the next 5 st decrease 2 times 7 10 single_crochet in the next 5 st decrease once 6 slip_stitch once cut the yarn tail and pull it through the final loop sew the stitches at the end of the teeth together visit myravelry page for more patterns or visit my etsy page for hook and needle holders note you may not sell items made from this pattern as i do not own this trademark/copyright but you may make them for free for anyone if you are going to give the pattern to someone or post it off- or online please put a link to my site i am offering these patterns for free and would like to be able to keep them that way body 1 in green single_crochet 6 in a magic_ring 2 increase* 12 3 single_crochet in the next st increase in the next st * 18 4 single_crochet in the next 2 st increase in the next st * 24 5 single_crochet in the next 3 st increase in the next st * 30 6 single_crochet in the next 4 st increase in the next st * 36 7 single_crochet in the next 5 st increase in the next st * 42 8 single_crochet in the next 6 st increase in the next st * 48 9-19 single_crochet* 48 20 single_crochet in the next 6 st decrease once * 42 21 single_crochet in the next 5 st decrease once * 36 22 single_crochet in the next 4 st decrease once * 30 change to red and stuff as the hole gets smaller 23 single_crochet in the next 3 st decrease once * 24 24 single_crochet in the
